flawed_nl_solution:
At the intermediate stop, 58-28=<<58-28=30>>30 students entered the bus before it stopped at the intersection.
40% of the number of students who entered the bus at the intermediate stop is 40/100*30=<<40/100*30=21>>21
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
